website_summaries.verdict: Automates medication reminders 4 times a day and with a voice recording that projects throughout a home.
pros: A large display and clear commands help those with memory loss and in need of regular reminders to maintain a consistent medication schedule
Can operate on batteries and provides both patients and caretakers with added independence
cons: Some note that while the overall functionality holds up over the years, the LCD screen does not

customer_reviews.title: I love this product so much, I actually gave her a name!
customer_reviews.text: Although I bought it for a patient who has multiple care givers, it would help anybody who takes medicine on a regular schedule. I did run into one glitch, however, this machine is set up for 4 times a day, my patient only needs three. I couldn't find instructions on how to set it up for three. My solution was to set up evening and night prescriptions for the same time. Problem solved. All of my patient's caregivers are praising this product. PS I named her "Big Mouth". But, in a good way. On the loud setting, she can be heard from anywhere in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous item. Perfect for anyone with multiple pills to take at times with no other natural reminder
customer_reviews.text: This unit is great! Volume is considerable and settings of loud and louder are helpful for making it heard throughtout the apartment or by hearing impaired people. Display is very large and readable. Setting it is not hard but not entirely intuitive but instructions are clear. Buttons on top are large and brightly colored to help them be clear for easy pressing even with limited vision patient. I am delighted with the unit and would buy it again if this one were damaged from a fall or something. We gave one to a neighbor in assisted living too.
customer_reviews.author: electroexplorer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my low vision, memory impaired 87 yr old mother
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly easy to set up. A regular alarm clock did not work for her since she couldn't remember why the alarm was buzzing or how to turn it off. This reminds her in clear, easily understood directions to take her meds. The 4 different times are ideal. Color coded, easy to see and feel buttons are perfect. "Red means stop", "green for day & time" she can remember. This has literally been a life safer. A wonderfully designed tool which has solved a huge problem. I ordered the cord so now I don't even have to change batteries.
customer_reviews.author: gardenburd

customer_reviews.title: he does pretty well, but could not remember to take his ...
customer_reviews.text: My father is in assisted living. At 94, he does pretty well, but could not remember to take his pills. This alarm has saved the day! He has been using this for the last 6 months, and I don't need to call and remind him about medication since this purchase. When the loud but friendly voice reminds him to take his morning/evening pills, it cannot be ignored. My sister said it was difficult for her to set up initially, but has never failed to deliver! As a side note I must add that it saves him over $400 a month in additional assisted living charges, too.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M Lackey

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandpa. He thought is was stupid at first but after a few days he really likes it. He has told his other friends about it and how good it works. It is easy to read (even for someone with very bad vision). It's loud enough for him to hear when he's sleeping in the back room across the house from the alarm clock. He is much more consistent with his medication!! Great product! I used it for about two months before buying the plug that is sold separately, but provides comfort to keep the batteries for back up.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA LESCHEWSKI

customer_reviews.title: Talking alarm
customer_reviews.text: This clock is easy to use and works well to help those with mild dementia. It also helps the caregiver to remember “now” is the time for their loved one or patient to take their medicine. It has the possibility to set for 4 reminders a day. Easy to also turn off and on, or acknowledge reminder. If away from clock and meds will remind every 10 mins or so until acknowledged. The alarm has 2 volume settings with womens polite voice speaking the time and reminder to take med and then when acknowledged says when next reminder will be sounded. This is a wonderful device.
customer_reviews.author: tm

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, and works well.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this MedCenter Talking Alarm Clark with the reminders, for My parents as they are having memory issues. I have asked them about it and I have been told that, this alarm clock is very easy to program with for the reminders, and that it does indeed work and go off at the times set. And that it is a great tool to use to help remember. I highly suggest this MedCenter talking alarm clock, as it does indeed help with memory issues and is easy to program and work.
customer_reviews.author: J2829

customer_reviews.title: The best talking med alarm I've found.
customer_reviews.text: Time, date, day of the week and shouts out loudly and clearly when it's time to take meds. Repeat warnings requiring you to acknowledge the message. Even reminds you of the next scheduled medication. Not too bad to set up but don't expect line by line instructions. It takes double AA batteries that are cheap, last long and I need them for cameras and flashlight so I have plenty on hand but still have the original set running after a month. Keeps good time too. Worth the price for use a table top clock alone.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: She makes Miss Google directions sound like a human
customer_reviews.text: I took this home for my mother to remind her to take her medications morning and night. It was a little on the cheap side as far as construction, but acceptable. It was easier to set up and program than the average clock/radio. I had to read the instructions several times to not use the noon and supper modes. The pleasant female voice is a little robotic. She makes Miss Google directions sound like a human. But the voice was not too annoying. The pleasant female voice gives you the time, day of the week and date and then reminds you it's time to take your morning medications.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Cargin

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Elderly but I do recommend setting it up for them.
customer_reviews.text: She has had it for a while with no problems. Especially since we cannot go into facility's these days to see the residents you will need to set this up before you take it to them. Understanding set up can possibly be a problem for them.
customer_reviews.author: rc

customer_reviews.title: Great for the elderly
customer_reviews.text: This is simple for the elderly to use. Once the alarms are set, they only have to press the large, red button to stop it. I strongly recommend this. The only reason I gave it four stars instead of five is that you have to purchase a cord separately if you want to plug it in instead of using batteries. It seems to me that for the price, that a cord should be included.
customer_reviews.author: David Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious invention! Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I love the talking medicine alarm clock. My son however hates it! It's very annoying to him but it reminds him to take his medicine. He is on a 4-Hour medicine rotation so this helps us tremendously in keeping him on track for his meds.
customer_reviews.author: hudlee68

customer_reviews.title: Augie S......" Pleased and Sister too"
customer_reviews.text: Looked at a few different models. Made a great pick in choosing this one for my 80 year old sister who takes several medications 3 times per day. With this clock you can set up to 4 different time reminders/Voice or Beep....I prefer the Voice. Female voice can be set on LOUD. Great for Seniors hard of hearing. EXAMPLE: She tells you, It is time to take your 2 o'clock medication...When the next dose is due and... Even tells you the Day and Date. Batteries included. Can be plugged in but does not come with a cord which is NOT a big issue for me considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Augie S.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this clock.
customer_reviews.text: The first Med clock I purchased (from different company) 2 years ago, was working fine for almost for 2 years. Then it started restating date/time; about once a month. So, I purchased (September 9, 2018) the new Med clock (from Amazon). I kept the clock not using it. The old clock started resetting date/time 1-3 times a week, so start using the new one. But I was able setup time and year and alarm 1 but not alarm 2,3 and 4. Do not buy this clock.
customer_reviews.author: WITOLD HENKE

customer_reviews.title: Medical Talking Clock
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for my grandma. Arrived quickly and works great! Wanted something to help her remember to take her pills as she would forget frequently. The alert is very easy for her to hear and does not stop until she manually turns it off. Can set the times easily by following the directions. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Williams

customer_reviews.title: Pluses and minuses
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 91-year-old mom but she hates it so I use it and it works fine for me but it is annoying when I push the button to acknowledge the alarm it says more than I need it to say as it gives the next time for a dose, the display lists the two digits of the month but not the abbreviation for the month which my mother didn't understand. Programming was okay for me but impossible for her.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dietzel

customer_reviews.title: 84 yo dad loves this! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Worth every penny for my 84yo dad who kept forgetting to take his meds! **"Update*** still working great. Dad loves it and loud enough for him to hear (and me as well. Ha ha) with his decreased hearing. Definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: This a wonderful tool to help remind one of time to take ...
customer_reviews.text: This a wonderful tool to help remind one of time to take medicine. My husband just can't remember to take his meds so I ordered this for him. Now he says every time it goes off: what's that? he has dementia and sometimes he will do it, but most of the time I go get his medicine for him. He sometimes takes two groups at once so I am trying everything possible to help him be on schedule as I think it is so important. Good idea and great tool.
customer_reviews.author: jaycee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to set up, the beep and voice reminder is loud and clear. Easy to turn off once medications are taken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my parents. Love them. So easy to use and great way to do med reminders. I didn’t realize there was more to purchase with it. May look into the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi M

customer_reviews.title: Our new best friend - the CLOCK,
customer_reviews.text: This is SO smart, and convenient. Lightweight yet hasfeatures that few others have. If you have several (4) events to be "alarmed" about, pills, tv programs, putting out the cat, etc then this is IT. Our Home health Care Nurse has already shown interest for a patient with failing eyesight. The time announce is great, helps keep us on the right day and date too. Big enough to have all the features you'd want yet small enough to conveniently find a place on a crowded table or nightstand. It can be easily carried from one part of the house to another as need be. Instructions appear complicated but taken in sequence they get it all done easily.
customer_reviews.author: DavE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for an elderly relative who had dementia. The product worked as I had hoped it would. Eventually she remembered to take an evening pill just before the alarm went off. She was proud of herself.
customer_reviews.author: GenieR

customer_reviews.title: Really Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: If you have to take med's then this is a good product for you! It's a hassle for many of us and this helps a lot! Besides the vocal alarm, it has a regular buzzer alarm, and if you have it on your bedside end table you don't have to have it facing you to know the time if the lights are off, and that's particularly good for people with sight problems....you just reach over and press a button and it will tell the time for you. A good buy for anyone that has to take multiple medications and a perfect gift for any friends or family that have to as well!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Dorn

customer_reviews.title: Great for forgetful patients.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this out of desperation for my dad who has congestive heart failure and refuses to move in with me. He finally takes his pills regularly which is saving his life right now. Also helps him to remember the day of the week.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought this for my 85 yr old mother that has early dementia to help her remember to take her medication. It was very easy to set up. We'll see how well it helps her.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri' Bryant

customer_reviews.title: This thing works great and is very loud
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great and is very loud! It is too loud for me but I think it would be a perfect product who is hearing impaired and needs to see big letters and numbers to remind them of the time and date. I wish I could return it for someone else to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: theLil

customer_reviews.title: No longer miss taking meds
customer_reviews.text: My husband takes several types of meds and has a hard time remembering if he either missed, or had taken a dose. The reminder check has worked perfectly. If you have it set for a voice reminder, a female voice will tell you when it's time. You can also set it to make 'beeping' as your reminder. It's very easy to set up. On the voice setting we can hear her throughout the house. 'She' will not stop reminding you every few minutes until you hit the red button on top. It will then tell you the time for your next med. It has made a world of difference for staying on schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Easy reminder set up clock
customer_reviews.text: Got this product for my 93 yr old mother to keep track of an issue every 2 hrs but she doesn't want to be bothered with it Definitely liked the easy set up and easy shut off Also big numbers on clock Great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for reminding you at a glance !
customer_reviews.text: This is so handy & easy to read to see at a glance to get time & day of week. I wouldn't take anything for it to keep me on right day.
customer_reviews.author: Small time gardener

customer_reviews.title: Works great, reminds at different times if needed
customer_reviews.text: My mom ABSOLUTELY loves this. She kept forgetting to take pills at certain times of day and this reminds her. There are a few settings so you can pick different times of day. Works as described. I set it up for her, wasn't difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rat

customer_reviews.title: Color coded buttons make it very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works well and has up to 4 alarms that can be set. Color coded buttons make it very easy to use. The only negative (positive for some for sure) is that it is loud. Can be used as a regular alarm clock too. It would be even better if it lit up at night, although it does have a light button to illuminate it when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Delivers on its promise
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great, and works exactly like promised. I believe it is a good product, and worth the cost, provided the user is able to hear the alarm(s).
customer_reviews.author: TF Mom

customer_reviews.title: This device was the perfect solution for my mother who takes multiple medications
customer_reviews.text: This device was the perfect solution for my mother who takes multiple medications, 3 times a day and is mostly home-bound. Remembering that mid-afternoon medication was difficult. This alarm is perfect. It has a voice, so it doesn't startle her when it goes off but it's loud enough to be heard in another room. It can be set for up to 4 alarm times and changing the alarm times is easy. I also like that it will tell you the day, date, and time....perfect for someone who needs a reminder every now and again! LOVE this device! I later combined this with the monthly pill organizer and life has gotten MUCH simpler!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn M. Ripley

customer_reviews.title: Between the alarm and talking notification it is working as ...
customer_reviews.text: Between the alarm and talking notification it is working as desired With the. Plume control turned to max it can be heard a room or 2 away This alarm has solved the problem of missed doses The day,date and time feature helps keep him oriented My only complaint is that the AC adapter did not come up as available in the initial product description and I had to order it separately after the alarm arrived
customer_reviews.author: Carol Dean

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product..my mom got so frustrated trying to stop.the beep, she threw it out...cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: gif

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs better options
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't give you options to keep it from saying morning afternoon evening or bed so i have to set it up different and it confuses people. For the most part it works good .
customer_reviews.author: Karry

customer_reviews.title: excellent product for elders
customer_reviews.text: bought for my elderly mother who kept forgetting to take her medicine, worked very well to remind her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my mom. Was easy to set up & is very easy for her to use every night. I really love that she doesn't have to worry about forgetting her medicine every night now!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Setting is a Head Ache
customer_reviews.text: Directions for setting are clear but the clock I got had some construction flaws which made getting it set a real pain. I'm not looking forward to the time changing. If you look at the company's return policy you will see that the consumer bears all costs associated with it's return shipping so it doesn't really make sense to return the clock for repair/replacement. After finally getting the clock set it works fine and is helping my mother remember to take her pills.
customer_reviews.author: Fisherman

customer_reviews.title: GREAT IDEA!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife became very ill and when she came home she needed some way to keep track of her new meds. This was the answer and now it drives me nuts, BUT IT STILL GIVES ACCURATE ALARMS and helps me not have to remind her when to take her meds. Outstanding product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Alarm does not repeat, nor do all 4 alarms work
customer_reviews.text: The alarm has large numbers and colorful buttons. It did not come with an A/C plug so I had to purchase one separately. It seems simple to use but it would NOT repeat as advertised. When the alarm did sound, it only did it once and then stopped on its own - not from the user shutting it off with the button. Also, it would sound the alarm once (say, 9am) per day but none of the other alarms would sound (12pm, 5pm, 9pm).
customer_reviews.author: Rita Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great for the elderly!
customer_reviews.text: It is sooooo helpful for my mom to make sure she takes her meds as scheduled. Thanks so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my elderly mom. She was having troubles remembering to take her medicine. This has been a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: MarineMoM9071

customer_reviews.title: useful medical pill taking alarm
customer_reviews.text: The ease of setting ,the volume ,and overall usefulness for people who can't remember to take their pills.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W. Papa

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my mother. It was simple to set up and loud enough for her to hear.
customer_reviews.author: DISNEYMOM4EVER

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: The MedCenter Talking Alarm Clock works great. It goes off at exactly the right time and lets you know to take your pills and works perfectly in every other way. I am very glad that I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Wartchow

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for an elderly parent. It doesn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an elderly parent . It doesn’t keep time correctly and the buttons that you use to change the settings broke off inside. You have to use a pencil to push the internal button. Very flimsy .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with memory problems
customer_reviews.text: Got for my mother in law with mild dementia bc she was not taking her meds. This was easy for me to set up and has worked perfectly. Nice that it talks so she knows why the alarm is going off.
customer_reviews.author: AEM

customer_reviews.title: Talking clock
customer_reviews.text: My 90 year old mother is quickly going blind and not adapting very well. This clock is easy enough to use and she could hear it even without her hearing aids in her ears. She loves it at night when she has insomnia and needs to know the time. The big green button is so easy for her to find with her hand. We did not buy it as a medication reminder -- just as a talking clock.
customer_reviews.author: Laura N-B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 4-alarm clock to help my Mom in taking all of her medication. She needs to take meds at 7AM, 10AM, 12Noon, and 2:30PM. I have set this to all 4 times and she now takes her medications regularlly and there are no times that are skipped accidentally anymore. She is 88 and a device like this is worth its weight in gold.
customer_reviews.author: Bert Weidemeier

customer_reviews.title: ... FINISHED SETTING IT - JUST READ DIRECTIONS - IT'S EASY - 7095-1 COMES WITH ADAPTOR AND HAS SLOT TO ...
customer_reviews.text: THIS MODEL DOES NOT HAVE OPENING FOR AN ADAPTOR - I RETURNED IT AND GOT MODEL 7095-1 AND JUST FINISHED SETTING IT - JUST READ DIRECTIONS - IT'S EASY - 7095-1 COMES WITH ADAPTOR AND HAS SLOT TO PLUG IN ADAPTOR - KEEP BATTERIES IN AT ALL TIMES SO YOU CAN MOVE FROM ROOM TO ROOM WITHOUT HAVING TO RESET IT EVERYTIME - WHEN YOU GET IT TO THE ROOM YOU WANT, JUST PLUG IN THE ADAPTOR AT THAT TIME - I'M HAVING HIP SURGERY AND MY LOVELY WIFE WON'T HAVE TO WAKE ME EVERY 4 HOURS LIKE SHE DID WHEN I HAD OTHER HIP REPLACED - AS FAR AS I'M CONCERNED, THIS 'BABY' IS A MUST
customer_reviews.author: BOB - MEQUON,WI

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My father has Alzheimer's and it's always been a struggle to get him to take all his pills everyday. Since I've gotten him the talking alarm clock he hasn't missed any of his pills. I'm super impressed. Very easy to use and set up. 10/10 do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Too few settings.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as described. Too few settings and numbers are too small and wrong color to read.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B

customer_reviews.title: Can set only 1 alarm
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for if you take multiple meds. If not then you have to set all the alarms to the time you need and when the alarm goes off it tells you good morning when it's evening. Other then that this is a great product
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Works great but not useful for me.
customer_reviews.text: The clock works exactly as advertised. BUT, it's only useful if you don't move around much, or if you carry it with you. I cannot predict where I'll be when it's time to give my cat his meds so I haven't used it. It would be perfect for someone who has a predictable schedule, e.g. if meds are taken at meal times when you're usually in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help my Mom remember her daily meds. It’s been great for both of us. Easy to use and very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: MEMILY

customer_reviews.title: Relief From Worry
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product...takes the worry off wondering if Dad took his pills or not...priceless!!
customer_reviews.author: B.J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this very useful item
customer_reviews.text: This is so handy for my mom who is pushing 90. She doesn't see well enough to read the clock face, but she uses the buttons daily to help her keep track of the day, date, and time, as well as taking her meds. I highly recommend this very useful item.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis C

customer_reviews.title: Good for older adults
customer_reviews.text: I bought this alarm clock to help my mother in law remember to take her medicine and it has large numbers and relatively easy to set up. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Pichea

customer_reviews.title: Talking Alarm Clock is amazing and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: My mom is 81 years old and having memory issues. The medcenter Talking Alarm Clock has been a life saver. She is now taking her medication every morning and in the evening. The alarm is easy to use and a great to travel with. My mom never knows what day it is, and she loves that her Talking Alarm gives her that information by pressing the green button. I highly recommend this to anyone or a family member having memory issues. It a wonderful product and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad. Easy to use/set up. You can set it up for any time AM/PM. Easy to change times.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Brecht

customer_reviews.title: Accurate but LOUD
customer_reviews.text: It’s soooo loud. Great for a person who is hard of hearing and living by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Emerald City

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Works after Playing Around with it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my parents who both need to take pills in the morning and evening. There were some problems setting up the different times and some compromises had to be made. The alarm is very loud, even on the quietest setting (two settings were available loud and louder). But they have been using it for a couple of months now and it forces them to remember to take their pills which is the point.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This alarm clock is really loud. It does job!! Although my husband hates it.
customer_reviews.author: Imuziok6010

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it was recently redesigned
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it was recently redesigned. The pictures on the instructions don't match the unit. Unit does not have a connector for external power supply, so it's batteries only. Not sure if it's going to forget its programming if the batteries are removed, and that can involve setting the date/time and up to 4 alarm times. The large day/date display is nice.
customer_reviews.author: GPS User

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: This works exactly how I needed it to. My mother lives alone, 3000 miles away, and wasn't taking her medication consistently, telling me she couldn't remember to do so. Now she gets a reminder 4 times per day, and she reports she's been following the schedule and rarely misses a dose. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M

customer_reviews.title: Great item! Super for medication reminder!
customer_reviews.text: My mother has Parkinson's disease and was in need of some way to remind herself when she needed to take her medications. This works beautifully and is super easy for a 90 year old to operate!
customer_reviews.author: Carol C  Blickenstorfer

customer_reviews.title: Never forget your meds.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect we first had a watch but this is best.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: This clock looked very cool, but it would be nice if it would ...
customer_reviews.text: This clock looked very cool, but it would be nice if it would function correctly. There was only one alarm that worked so you could not set more than one alarm. I hate the hassle of having to return things that don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Amaya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice & loud. Does not shut off until button is pushed- this is good.
customer_reviews.author: gecs

customer_reviews.title: 8 stars
customer_reviews.text: 3 extra stars for allowing a moron like me figure out how to program it without instructions. It's easy, it's loud, works great. I'm only using 3 of the 4 alarm sets, I just turned the 4th alarm to off. I like the females voice, it's loud and quite clear. when she goes off you just hit the acknowledge button and she tells you when her next alarm will begin. I love it
customer_reviews.author: J. King

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly who forget to take their meds
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly aunt who was always forgetting to take her meds. This is easy to use and very easy to read. I just wish you could record a different reminder.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley C

customer_reviews.title: In theory this is very good. Worked for a day and then it wouldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: In theory this is very good. Worked for a day and then it wouldn't shut up. My mom called me with this thing repeating in the background over and over. (Of course it was my voice) Had to remove batteries to shut me up.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to program and works quite well. A great help for elderly person.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: I wore out the first one, the one that came with the Med Center. Keeps me med compliant. Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My experience with this particular alarm was short. The first one I ordered would only allow me to set the first alarm. So I returned and received the second alarm two days later. I was super exited when I able to set alarm 1, 2, and 3. Alarm#4 doesn't work but because the alarms are preset alarm#4 goes off at 10pm every night. I'm so disappointed because I really needed this alarm clock!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra G.

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: this timer does a good job, it is a little difficult to program, so you will have to program it for the elderly.The Voice that actually comes with it is actually a louder than the tone alarm. I would recommend it, other than the most prominent thing in the display window is todays date. I think thats a little strange, but whatever...
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky Watchman

customer_reviews.title: This product worked great, for 5 days
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great, for 5 days. Amazon quickly sent a replacement. The replacement never worked at all. I'm very disappointed. It would have been the perfect alarm for my elderly parents.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: after 6 to 9 months malfunctions completely useless.
customer_reviews.text: have bought 2 of them. after 6 to 9 months malfunctions completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Lent

customer_reviews.title: I don't know why more companies don't make these.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why more companies don't make these. This has been so helpful for my father who has both hearing and vision problems
customer_reviews.author: Amy R.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: My aunt loves it, it’s a nice reminder for her to take her meds.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne D.

customer_reviews.title: ... my dad remember to take his medication and it's better than I hoped
customer_reviews.text: bought this to help my dad remember to take his medication and it's better than I hoped!!! Will recommend to others!

customer_reviews.title: ... ordered this for my Mom and it is the best product! Takes the worry out of forgetting to ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my Mom and it is the best product! Takes the worry out of forgetting to take a prescribed dose of medication that is to be taken at a specific time each evening. All the features this product has is amazing. Highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: this was for my Mom to help her to remember to take her medications multiple times in each day. Works great and is easy to use

customer_reviews.title: Has worked great
customer_reviews.text: I got for my mom to remind her to take her meds. Has worked great. Best feature is that she has to acknowledge the alarm when it's time to take her meds.
customer_reviews.author: bill haalck

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: My mother is 97. She likes that "woman calls her every night to remind her. I wouldn't remember without her help." Annoying electronic voice, but she doesn't seem to mind it.
customer_reviews.author: Dmanf

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced for the quality of the product. Digital screen can only be read straight on.

customer_reviews.text: Item very small, much smaller than the picture show, very complicated to use

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my 80 year old mom and she ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 80 year old mom and she loves it. She set it up with no problem and loves that it 'talks' to her. lol
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Its bright and loud
customer_reviews.text: Good for someone who has trouble taking their pills. Good reminder, if they will listen and understand.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get in the habit of it
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work for the person it was intended for. We gave it a good tryout, and then were *greatly dismayed* it was not returnable, having missed the return window by one day.
customer_reviews.author: HedyStuff

customer_reviews.title: Works as a Reminder for my Mom
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised and works great in reminding my mother to take her medications in the morning and evening,
customer_reviews.author: DCallaghan

customer_reviews.title: Works very well, a solution that is working for ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well , a solution that is working for my elderly parents , haven’t missed dosage since purchasing . My elderly father loves it , helps decrease the stress of dealing with his forgetfulness
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend purchasing this alarm. We received the alarm and it never worked correctly. I hated it. The sound is obnoxious and the date clock kept going back to the default setting. So, my daughter had to reprogram it every other day. I have trouble walking. So, if I was not in the room with the alarm, I could not hit the stop button quickly. It does not turn off after a certain amount of time. So, it would screech for 10 minutes or more. I was in and out of the hospital so we missed the 30 day return deadline. The seller will not refund the money. I won't buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Horneffer

customer_reviews.title: set and forget
customer_reviews.text: no more forgetting my pills, easy to set up. loud so it can be hard.
customer_reviews.author: Lizann

customer_reviews.title: Awesom
customer_reviews.text: This is for my grandmother who is almost blind, and almost deaf. It is actually loud enough for her to hear and that is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Melton

customer_reviews.title: it works well
customer_reviews.text: purchased this for my mom. it goes off 4 times a day. i would buy it again. easy to setup. i put a little tape over the speakers so it is not so load. also put some tape over the switches on the back so they could not be accidentally changed because the alarm is sometimes carried around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: this clock is very helpful. There are 4 times that you can set, and it is easy to set. I was worried that I bought this and not the entire set (was not aware of the rest of the things that go with this), but it works fine independently. The only thing that would make it better is to set your own reminder for things other than meds. But that is not its purpose. It works well and is easy to use. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn L. Brau

customer_reviews.title: Love this mediciation reminder
customer_reviews.text: this has saved our lives. Now my mother in law knows when to take her meds. and what day an month it is...Truely that was all a hugh issue. Now it is not....Love this mediciation reminder
customer_reviews.author: Sissy Louise

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The clock works like a charm, no more missing meds.
customer_reviews.author: Karley

product_meta.title: MedCenter Talking Alarm Clock
product_meta.description: The "Take Your Pills" Talking Alarm Clock alerts users when it's time to take their medication with a friendly female voice up to 4 times daily. HOW DOES IT WORK? Set up to 4 Daily Alarms to alert you when your medication is due. A repeating friendly reminder notifies you of the time, the date and which daily dose to take. ("Good morning! Please take your morning pills for the 20th.") Press the "Alarm Acknowledged Button" to confirm compliance and the MedCenter Talking Alarm Clock tells you when the next daily dose is due. Features: Talking Alarm alerts users when it's time to take their medication Alarm sounds periodically until special 'alarm acknowledged' button is pressed Loud and Extra Loud sound settings ensure the alarm is heard Large-Type Display makes viewing the date, day and time easy Up to 4 Daily Alarms (Morning, Afternoon, Evening, Night) Preset with Default Alarm Times (morning: 7:00 a.m., afternoon: 1:00 p.m., evening: 6:00 p.m., night: 10:30 p.m.) Backlit display for convenient night time viewing
feature_bullets: Alerts users it's time to take their medication along with the time and date using a repeating friendly female voice up to 4 times daily (Morning, Afternoon, Evening, Night). "Good morning. Please take your MORNING pills for the 20th.
Designed to be easy to set, easy to see, and LOUD. The alarm has LOUD and EXTRA LOUD setting and a large-type backlight display for night viewing.
Strong emphasizes on the DATE rather than the DAY of the Week as often confusion can occur as to what day of the week it is
Does not work alongside a smartphone or confusing app as the alarm clock was developed to be simple and easy to understand with a direct function for aiding in medication compliance
Runs on (2)AA batteries (INCLUDED) Product Dimensions: 5" long x 1.75" wide x 2.5" high Shipping Weight: 15oz
